Q009.question: Q009
Q009.name: Q009

items.instruction_de: Bitte geben Sie alles Zutreffende an.

items.text: My business is directly affected by new regulations, such as opening hours or other restrictions

items.text: My business is directly affected by the fact that my suppliers cannot supply me with the primary products I need for my business

items.text: My company is directly affected by the fact that customers have canceled their orders for my products or are currently not requesting my services
items.text_de: Mein Betrieb ist direkt davon betroffen, dass Kunden ihre Bestellungen für meine Produkte storniert haben bzw. meine Dienstleistungen derzeit nicht nachfragen
